content: Guests and Users cannot be assigned as Room managers. Only Room and {{productName}} admins are suitable for the specified role.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when users or guests are assigned as room managers. It informs the user that only certain admins (room and {{productName}}) are suitable for this role. This message appears in an invite panel and alerts users about accessibility restrictions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'specified role' is not accurately conveyed. 'الدور المحدد' (al-door al-muhaddad) translates to 'the specified role' but a more natural phrasing in Arabic might be something like 'هذا الدور' (hatha al-door) meaning 'this role' or 'this position'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لا يمكن تعيين الضيوف والمستخدمين كمديري غرف. فقط مسؤولو الغرف وإدارة {{productName}} مناسبون لهذا الدور.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "Room managers" is translated as "Otaq administratoru". While technically correct, "Otaq inzibatçısı" might be a more natural and common term for 'Room managers' in Azerbaijani.  'Administratoru' implies a passive state, while 'inzibatçısı' conveys more actively managing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Qonaq və İstifadəçilər Otaq inzibatçısı kimi təyin edilə bilməz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes 'göstərilən rol', which translates to 'the specified role'. It's slightly wordy. A more concise phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Qonaq və İstifadəçilər Otaq inzibatçısı kimi təyin edilə bilməz. Yalnız Otaq və {{productName}} administratorları bu rol üçün uyğundur.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'suitable for the specified role' could be improved to better convey the intended meaning in Greek. The current translation ('κατάλληλοι για τον καθορισμένο ρόλο') is literal but slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing might emphasize fitness or qualification.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Οι διαχειριστές Δωματίων και {{productName}} είναι οι μόνοι που μπορούν να αναλάβουν αυτόν τον ρόλο.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Vieraita' (Guests) is German, not Finnish. The correct Finnish word for 'Guests' is 'Vieraita'. It should be 'Käyttäjiä'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Käyttäjiä ja käyttäjiä ei voida asettaa huoneen johtajiksi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "jouer le rôle spécifié" is an awkward translation of "suitable for the specified role." It implies acting a role rather than being qualified for it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Les invités et les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas être désignés comme gestionnaires de salle. Seuls les administrateurs de salle et de {{productName}} sont aptes à ce rôle.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation includes a colon after 'մենեջերներ', which doesn't match the English sentence structure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon after 'մենեջերներ': Հյուրերը և օգտատերերը չեն կարող նշանակվել որպես Սենյակի մենեջերներ Նշված դերի համար հարմար են միայն Սենյակի և {{productName}} ադմինիստրատորները:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "その役割に適しています" (sono yakuwari ni tekishite imasu) is a somewhat formal and indirect way of saying 'suitable'. A more natural and direct translation would be something like "その役割にふさわしいです" (sono yakuwari ni fusawashii desu) or simply "その役割が適任です" (sono yakuwari ga tekkin desu).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ゲストおよびユーザーはルーム管理者に指定できません。ルーム管理者および{{productName}}管理者だけが、その役割にふさわしいです。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຖືກຕ້ອງ' (tuk tong) in 'ພຽງແຕ່ຜູ້ບໍລິຫານຫ້ອງ ແລະ {{productName}} ເທົ່ານັ້ນທີ່ຈະຖືກຕ້ອງສໍາລັບບົດບາດທີ່ກໍາຫນົດໄວ້' is not the most natural or accurate translation for 'suitable'. It implies 'correct' or 'right' rather than 'appropriate' or 'fit'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ພຽງແຕ່ຜູ້ບໍລິຫານຫ້ອງ ແລະ {{productName}} ເທົ່ານັ້ນທີ່ຈະເຫມາະສົມສໍາລັບບົດບາດທີ່ກໍາຫນົດໄວ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Norādītajai lomai ir piemērota tikai..." is a somewhat awkward phrasing. A more natural translation would be something like "Šo lomu var ieņemt tikai..." or "Tikai telpa un... var ieņemt šo lomu".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tikai telpa un {{productName}} administratori var ieņemt šo lomu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "opgegeven rol vervullen" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "specified role". A more appropriate translation would emphasize suitability or appropriateness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gasten en Gebruikers kunnen niet worden toegewezen als Kamerbeheerders. Alleen Kamer en {{productName}} beheerders zijn geschikt voor de opgegeven rol.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Utilizadors' is misspelled. The correct Portuguese word is 'Utilizadores'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizadores

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "desemnate Administratori de sală" is awkward. 'Desemnat' implies a formal designation, which doesn't fit the context. A more natural translation for 'assigned' would be 'numiți'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Invitați și Utilizatori nu pot fi numiți Administratori de sală.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'atribuite rolul menționat' is unnecessarily wordy and could be simplified. It translates literally to 'assigned the mentioned role'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Numai administratori de sală și administratori {{productName}} pot deține rolul.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a little clunky. Breaking it into two sentences would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Invitați și Utilizatori nu pot fi numiți Administratori de sală. Numai administratori de sală și administratori {{productName}} pot deține rolul.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Guests and Users cannot be assigned as Room managers" is somewhat passive. The Russian translation "Гости и Пользователи не могут быть назначены Менеджерами комнат" is a direct translation, but sounds less natural. A more natural phrasing would be something like "Гости и Пользователи не могут быть ответственными за управление комнатами" or "Гости и Пользователи не могут выполнять роль Менеджера комнаты".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Гости и Пользователи не могут выполнять роль Менеджера комнаты.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශීලකයින්' (parishilakayin) which translates to 'users' is a slightly awkward and less common way to say it. A more natural translation might be 'භාවිතකරුවන්' (bhavitakaruwan).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'පරිශීලකයින්' with 'භාවිතකරුවන්'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'ආගන්තුකයින් සහ පරිශීලකයින් කාමර කළමණාකරුවන් ලෙස පත් කළ නොහැකි' is a bit long and can be improved for readability. A more fluent structure might be 'ආගන්තුකයින් සහ පරිශීලකයින් කාමර කළමණාකරුවන් ලෙස පත් කිරීමට හැකියාවක් లేదు'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ආගන්තුකයින් සහ පරිශීලකයින් කාමර කළමණාකරුවන් ලෙස පත් කළ නොහැකි' with 'ආගන්තුකයින් සහ පරිශීලකයින් කාමර කළමණාකරුවන් ලෙස පත් කිරීමට හැකියාවක් లేదు'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'assigned as' is not accurately reflected in the Slovak translation. 'Označení' implies marking or labeling, not assigning a role. 'Pridelená' is closer to 'assigned' but still not quite right.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hostia a používatelia nemôžu byť menovaní za manažérov miestnosti. Iba administrátorom miestnosti a administrátorom {{productName}} môže byť táto funkcia pridelená.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'role' is inadequately translated.  'Funkcia' is closer than 'rola' in this context, as 'rola' often refers to a more formal or predefined role.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hostia a používatelia nemôžu byť menovaní za manažérov miestnosti. Iba administrátorom miestnosti a administrátorom {{productName}} môže byť táto funkcia pridelená.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Guests and Users" as "Gostov in uporabnikov" is grammatically awkward in Slovenian. It should be rephrased to sound more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gostov in uporabnikom ni mogoče dodeliti...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'določiti' (to assign/determine) isn't the most natural fit for 'assigned' in this context.  'Dodeliti' would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gostov in uporabnikom ni mogoče dodeliti za upravitelje sob.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'primerni za to vlogo' is a bit stiff. A more fluid phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: so upravičeni za to vlogo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'погодни за одређену улогу' translates to 'suitable for a specific role' but isn't the most natural or clear way to convey the meaning in Serbian. A better phrasing would emphasize eligibility or appropriateness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Само администратори собе и {{productName}} администратори су квалификовани за ту улогу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the use of Cyrillic is correct, the consistent capitalization throughout the sentence may not be the preferred style. Serbian typically capitalizes only the first word of the sentence and proper nouns.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Гости и Корисници не могу бити постављени као менаџери собе. Само администратори собе и {{productName}} администратори су квалификовани за ту улогу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'pogodni za određenu ulogu' is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally. A more idiomatic translation for 'suitable' in this context would be 'mogu obavljati tu ulogu' or 'adekvatni za tu ulogu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gosti i Korisnici ne mogu biti postavljeni kao Menadžeri sobe. Samo administratori sobe i {{productName}} mogu obavljati tu ulogu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'specified role' is awkwardly translated. 'được chỉ định' (specified) is redundant, as 'vai trò' already implies a specific role.  It makes the sentence feel unnatural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Khách và Người dùng không thể được chỉ định làm người quản lý Phòng. Chỉ Phòng và quản trị viên {{productName}} mới phù hợp với vai trò này.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Guests and Users cannot be assigned as Room managers' is translated too literally. A more natural phrasing in Chinese would convey the restriction more clearly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 访客和用户不能被设置为房间管理员 (Fǎkè hé yònghù bùnéng bèi shèzhào wénjiān guànlǐ员).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Only Room and {{productName}} admins are suitable for the specified role' is slightly awkward in Chinese. While technically correct, it's not the most fluent way to express this.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 只有房间管理员和{{productName}}管理员才能担任该角色 (Zhǐyǒu wénjiān guànlǐ员 hé {{productName}} guànlǐ员 cáinéng dānrèn gāi juésè).
